item.title: About Me
item.description:
Abdullah Nazmus-Sakib

Innovative Third-Year Computer Science Student at Jahangirnagar University | Passionate About AI and Software Development | Seeking Internship Opportunities | Skilled in HTML, CSS, Java, JavaScript, C, C++, Python, and Database Management

Bachelor of Science - BS, Department of Computer Science and Engineering

Description

I‚Äôm currently a third-year student at Jahangirnagar University, majoring in Computer Science and Engineering. My time here has been an incredible journey of growth, both academically and personally. The university offers a rich learning environment, where I‚Äôm not only gaining technical skills but also engaging in research and projects that push my creativity and problem-solving abilities.
